TopicTitle: How long has it been since my ship was launched?

Articles.Content:
Is there any way to tell how long it's been since one of my ships was launched if I've already reset the visible MET by docking at a space station?

Edited October 28, 2014 by Mitchz95

open your SFS file in a text editor, search for the name of your ship, and in that block of properties you'll find LCT, which is the launch time in seconds from 0 epoch (the start of the game). Subtract this number from the UT property (search that out as well) and you'll have the number of seconds since launch
